message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm hoping we can make a deal.  To kick things off, I'm offering it to you for $22,000.

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $18,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective on the price. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $20,000? I'm confident this product will bring you a lot of value.

Hi Alice, thank you for the revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $20,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $19,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.
